thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: NOISY!
thread.title_full: NOISY! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Midtown Park Ave, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stefan10520
title: NOISY!
text:
I stayed here for several days and while the hotel itself is wonderful, they have a truck that would come from the Clean Air Group in the late morning every day and sit out in front of the hotel making the most disruptive noise for 30-40 minutes at a time. I could barely hear myself think and my room was rattling from the noise. Very frustrating! I would not recommend this place.
Room Tip: Don't stay in a room at the front of the hotel near street level. You'll regret it. See more room tips
